letters.description: Identify the environmental, physical, and emotional triggers causing HPA axis dysregulation.
Align daily habits with the natural circadian cycle to normalize cortisol production.
Implement dietary changes to stabilize blood sugar and provide essential adrenal micronutrients.
Use somatic tools to shift the body from a state of 'fight or flight' to 'rest and digest.'
Prioritize deep, restorative sleep and intentional downtime to allow for cellular repair.
Gradually introduce movement and stressors to strengthen the body's adaptive capacity.
Integrate long-term lifestyle shifts that protect hormonal health and sustain energy levels.
